client-settings.name: HRTニューオータニ株式会社

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto!important} #site-translate-icp { width: auto; } .pager a:lang(en) { font-size: 70%; } .reserv_ul:lang(en) { margin-left: 0; } .inpage_bottom li:lang(en) { font-size: 11.3px; } .search-form:lang(en) { padding-left: 0; } .recommend:lang(en) { margin: 2.3% auto 0; } #summer #sec08 .abs { top: 240px; } #winter #sec04 .abs { top: 80px; } footer { margin: 44px auto 0; } @media screen and (min-width: 783px) { #bread:lang(en) { margin: 53px 0 8px 0; } .wide_phone {top: 168px;} #event .btn {bottom:0;}} /* ******** ski ******** */ .abs_whether {width: 75px; top: 230px;} @media screen and (max-width: 400px) { #lift.inner { padding: 0; } .wpct52 { width: auto; } #main-content { display: block; }}
